title: To catch a thief - interiors story in pictures
text: Left to right: Rose gold, pink rubellite, amethyst, pink tourmaline and pavé diamond necklace, POA, Bulgari . Code 11:59 watch, POA, by Audemars Piguet . Zip necklace and Brume de Saphir bracelet (on jacket), POA, by Van Cleef & Arpels . Flora diamond necklace, £4,250, with ruby drop, £3,225, by Lark & Berry . Tango rose gold bracelet, POA, by Pomellato . Brume de Saphir diamond and sapphire bracelet, POA, by Van Cleef & Arpels This article contains affiliate links, which means we may earn a small commission if a reader clicks through and makes a purchase. description: In the dead of night, the lure of modern design proves hard to resist
